channel.title: take action on Tedy Herlambang
channel.description: Recent content in take action on Tedy Herlambang

item.title: Kaka and Ale on Taking Action
item.description: Ale: Ka, agama kita mengajarkan bahwa setiap diri kita adalah pemimpin dan setiap diri kita akan diminta tanggung jawab tentang itu. Kaka: Yes, leadership is about activity and responsibility. A president and a tukang becak can both lead. They have to take action and be responsible for their action. Sooner or later, one can’t escape responsibility for taking action in their life. That is why each of us must learn how to take action.
